website_summaries.verdict: A rugged and insulated boot ready for the winter days, the Eddie Bauer Mountain Ops hiking boots have stunned hundreds of customers for its high-quality construction, protective features, and most of all, the top-notch comfort level. In many cases, it surpassed their expectations for a snow boot. But it’s not without some flaws. While not such a big deal for most people, for some pro hikers, this boot can still have lots of improvement in the lacing system.
pros: An overwhelming number of Eddie Bauer Mountain Ops reviews demonstrate how truly comfortable this hiking boot is
Many people have given it high marks for its beefy construction
A lot of them find this boot very warm during cold winter hikes and snowy walks around the town
Dozens of hikers and casual wearers agree that the Eddie Bauer Mountain Ops boots have good traction, particularly on snow and ice
Plenty of reviewers are impressed by the protection it offers against the elements, especially rain and water
A handful of consumers find this boot very supportive and stable
cons: Several customers note that this hiker runs a bit narrow
A few reviewers aren’t pleased with the laces
Aside from being short, the lacing system itself does not disperse pressure well, according to them

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work outside in wi winter. 2 days ago my son son was home for Xmas and we went ice fishing, he forgot his boots so I let him wear my good hunting boots and I wore these. 10" of snow and 3" of slush n water underneath, I couldn't be more happy with how these performed. Feet stayed completely dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot. Comfortable and warm. Time will tell on durability. Though I am optimistic. My ecco’s had the stitching fail. So I am glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Trump

customer_reviews.title: Narrow & $26 return cost
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Tough materials deep enough lugs on sole for hiking. My foot was too wide or shoe too narrow Heads up it cost me $26 to return these via UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this shoe for almost a year now and I have no issues with it. It kept my feet warm and dry. Very comfortable while working. What more can you ask for in a shoe. I've owned many boots for work but I have to say, this is one of my favorite. I will definitely buy it again once this one gets worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. I wear them everyday and also wear them to walk for exercise 2-3 times per week (10-20 miles per week). They provide the support I need, do not hurt my feet and lasted approximately a full year before I replaced them. Very good shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Gabree

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Will update if anything bad happens after use in the winter Update: These boots are a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Chef Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot for colder weather. So far, after 3 weeks of regular use, this boot has exceeded my expectations. It is warm, comfortable, and (in my opinion) stylish. The traction had been good in the snow and ice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking but narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: The look of this boot is cool as heck. I would have kept these but too narrow. They don’t come in a wide size.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots. I even were them around the house because I don’t want to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus S.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: This is a good boot for the rain & snow I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie O Bartley

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- Horrible return service
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was great quality But it was to large. (My fault) I returned the shoe at my expense on 10/26/2020 verified. As of 11/6/2020, still no refund. I was told they needed 14 days to receive and document return, then another 7 days to issue refund. In this modern age, I would think you could do better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: these are the most comfortable best pair of boots I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I am 41 years old and I have worn work boots all my life, as soon as I put these boots on I was blown away, these are the most comfortable best pair of boots I've ever bought. I like them so much I bought another pair to save them just in case they stop making these. They feel great and are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mcwalmart

customer_reviews.title: One of the best hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: No break-in required. Insulated, light, breathable, comfortable, and very stylish looking as well. Wore them to hike in Death Valley in winter time -- (i.e. snow, salt, mud, puddles, sand dune, etc.) and they protected my feel very well. Perfect for cold/cool weather use but I have not tried them in summer/hot hiking environment.
customer_reviews.author: junoso1

product_meta.title: Men's Eddie Bauer Mountain Ops Boot
product_meta.description: Waterproof. Insulated. Rugged. The all-day, all-winter, all-purpose work boot. Built to take you further when the temperature plummets. Fully weatherproof full-grain leather upper.
feature_bullets: MidLite premium EVA midsole for minimized weight without sacrificing durability, support, or comfort
MultiPitch Pro exclusive, aggressive outsole design using Vibram XS Trek rubber compound
InsoFit cushioning EVA footbed delivers all-day support while reducing weight and bulk
ThermaFill 100 insulation against cold, wet weather
